mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_id AS userId,t2.username AS userName,t1.money AS money ,'2' AS operating,t1.create_time as createTime from ht_account_recharge t1 left join ht_r_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where t1.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND t1.create_time < STR_TO_DATE('2019-04-03 18:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT t1.user_id AS userId,t1.user_name AS userName,SUM(t1.actual_pay_total) AS money ,'3' AS operating ,FROM_UNIXTIME(t1.repay_actual_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from ht_hjh_repay t1 where t1.repay_status = 2 and t1.order_status=7 and t1.repay_actual_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2018-04-01 00:00:00') AND t1.repay_actual_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2018-04-03 18:00:00') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

select t1.user_id AS userId,t1.user_name AS userName,SUM(t1.assign_capital) AS money ,'3' AS operating ,t1.create_time as createTime from ht_credit_tender t1 where t1.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-01 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND t1.create_time < STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-03 18:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

select t1.user_id AS userId,t1.user_name AS userName,SUM(t1.accede_account) AS money ,'1' AS operating ,t1.create_time as createTime from ht_hjh_accede t1 where t1.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-01 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND t1.create_time < STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-03 18:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT t1.user_id AS userId,t2.username AS userName,t1.total AS money,'4' AS operating,t1.create_time as createTime from ht_account_withdraw t1 left join ht_r_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where t1.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND t1.create_time < STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-03 18:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT t1.nid orderId,t1.user_id userId, t1.user_name userName,t1.recover_account_yes money,'3' AS operating,FROM_UNIXTIME(t1.recover_yestime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime from ht_borrow_recover t1 where t1.recover_yestime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2019-04-01 00:00:00') and t1.recover_yestime < UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2018-04-03 18:00:00') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT bt.user_name as userName,bt.user_id as userId, bt.nid as orderId,bt.account as money, b.project_type AS projectType,'1' as operating,bt.create_time as createTime FROM ht_borrow_tender bt INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bt.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid where bt.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE('2019-04-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND bt.create_time < STR_TO_DATE('2018-04-03 18:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}
